name: 219-19 icebreaker hat
notes:
knitted hipster hat for men in drops nepal. the piece is worked bottom up with rib. sizes s - xl.

drops design: pattern no ne-345
yarn group c or a +

**sizes**:
s/m - l/xl
fits head size: 57/59 - 59/62 cm

**materials**:
drops nepal from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group c)
150-150 g colour 8905, deep ocean

**knitting tension**:
17 stitches in width and 22 rows in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm.

needles:
drops double pointed needles size 5 mm.
drops circular needle size 5 mm: length 40 cm.
